49 
50 ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::OMPLInterface(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model,
51  const ros::NodeHandle& nh)
52  : nh_(nh)
53  , robot_model_(robot_model)
54  , constraint_sampler_manager_(new constraint_samplers::ConstraintSamplerManager())
55  , context_manager_(robot_model, constraint_sampler_manager_)
56  , use_constraints_approximations_(true)
57  , simplify_solutions_(true)
58 {
59  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Initializing OMPL interface using ROS parameters");
60  loadPlannerConfigurations();
61  loadConstraintSamplers();
62 }
63 
64 ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::OMPLInterface(const moveit::core::RobotModelConstPtr& robot_model,
65  const planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationMap& pconfig,
66  const ros::NodeHandle& nh)
67  : nh_(nh)
68  , robot_model_(robot_model)
69  , constraint_sampler_manager_(new constraint_samplers::ConstraintSamplerManager())
70  , context_manager_(robot_model, constraint_sampler_manager_)
71  , use_constraints_approximations_(true)
72  , simplify_solutions_(true)
73 {
74  ROS_DEBUG_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Initializing OMPL interface using specified configuration");
75  setPlannerConfigurations(pconfig);
76  loadConstraintSamplers();
77 }

79 ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::~OMPLInterface() = default;
80 
81 void ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::setPlannerConfigurations(const planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationMap& pconfig)
82 {
83  planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationMap pconfig2 = pconfig;
84 
85  // construct default configurations for planning groups that don't have configs already passed in
86  for (const moveit::core::JointModelGroup* group : robot_model_->getJointModelGroups())
87  {
88  if (pconfig.find(group->getName()) == pconfig.end())
89  {
90  planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationSettings empty;
91  empty.name = empty.group = group->getName();
92  pconfig2[empty.name] = empty;
93  }
94  }
95 
96  context_manager_.setPlannerConfigurations(pconfig2);
97 }
98 
99 ompl_interface::ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr
100 ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::getPlanningContext(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene,
101  const planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest& req) const
102 {
103  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes dummy;
104  return getPlanningContext(planning_scene, req, dummy);
105 }
106 
107 ompl_interface::ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr
108 ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::getPlanningContext(const planning_scene::PlanningSceneConstPtr& planning_scene,
109  const planning_interface::MotionPlanRequest& req,
110  moveit_msgs::MoveItErrorCodes& error_code) const
111 {
112  ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr ctx =
113  context_manager_.getPlanningContext(planning_scene, req, error_code, nh_, use_constraints_approximations_);
114  if (ctx)
115  configureContext(ctx);
116  return ctx;
117 }
118 
119 void ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::configureContext(const ModelBasedPlanningContextPtr& context) const
120 {
121  context->simplifySolutions(simplify_solutions_);
122 }
123 
124 void ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::loadConstraintSamplers()
125 {
126  constraint_sampler_manager_loader_ =
127  std::make_shared<constraint_sampler_manager_loader::ConstraintSamplerManagerLoader>(constraint_sampler_manager_);
128 }
129 
130 bool ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::loadPlannerConfiguration(
131  const std::string& group_name, const std::string& planner_id,
132  const std::map<std::string, std::string>& group_params,
133  planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationSettings& planner_config)
134 {
135  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue xml_config;
136  if (!nh_.getParam("planner_configs/" + planner_id, xml_config))
137  {
138  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Could not find the planner configuration '%s' on the param server", planner_id.c_str());
139  return false;
140  }
141 
142  if (xml_config.getType() != XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeStruct)
143  {
144  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "A planning configuration should be of type XmlRpc Struct type (for configuration '%s')",
145  planner_id.c_str());
146  return false;
147  }
148 
149  planner_config.name = group_name + "[" + planner_id + "]";
150  planner_config.group = group_name;
151 
152  // default to specified parameters of the group (overridden by configuration specific parameters)
153  planner_config.config = group_params;
154 
155  // read parameters specific for this configuration
156  for (std::pair<const std::string, XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue>& element : xml_config)
157  {
158  if (element.second.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeString)
159  planner_config.config[element.first] = static_cast<std::string>(element.second);
160  else if (element.second.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeDouble)
161  planner_config.config[element.first] = moveit::core::toString(static_cast<double>(element.second));
162  else if (element.second.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeInt)
163  planner_config.config[element.first] = std::to_string(static_cast<int>(element.second));
164  else if (element.second.getType() == XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeBoolean)
165  planner_config.config[element.first] = std::to_string(static_cast<bool>(element.second));
166  }
167 
168  return true;
169 }
170 
171 void ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::loadPlannerConfigurations()
172 {
173  // read the planning configuration for each group
174  planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationMap pconfig;
175  pconfig.clear();
176 
177  for (const std::string& group_name : robot_model_->getJointModelGroupNames())
178  {
179  // the set of planning parameters that can be specific for the group (inherited by configurations of that group)
180  static const std::string KNOWN_GROUP_PARAMS[] = { "projection_evaluator", "longest_valid_segment_fraction",
181  "enforce_joint_model_state_space" };
182 
183  // get parameters specific for the robot planning group
184  std::map<std::string, std::string> specific_group_params;
185  for (const std::string& k : KNOWN_GROUP_PARAMS)
186  {
187  std::string param_name{ group_name };
188  param_name += "/";
189  param_name += k;
190 
191  if (nh_.hasParam(param_name))
192  {
193  std::string value;
194  if (nh_.getParam(param_name, value))
195  {
196  if (!value.empty())
197  specific_group_params[k] = value;
198  continue;
199  }
200 
201  double value_d;
202  if (nh_.getParam(param_name, value_d))
203  {
204  // convert to string using no locale
205  specific_group_params[k] = moveit::core::toString(value_d);
206  continue;
207  }
208 
209  int value_i;
210  if (nh_.getParam(param_name, value_i))
211  {
212  specific_group_params[k] = std::to_string(value_i);
213  continue;
214  }
215 
216  bool value_b;
217  if (nh_.getParam(param_name, value_b))
218  {
219  specific_group_params[k] = std::to_string(value_b);
220  continue;
221  }
222  }
223  }
224 
225  // add default planner configuration
226  planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationSettings default_pc;
227  std::string default_planner_id;
228  if (nh_.getParam(group_name + "/default_planner_config", default_planner_id))
229  {
230  if (!loadPlannerConfiguration(group_name, default_planner_id, specific_group_params, default_pc))
231  default_planner_id = "";
232  }
233 
234  if (default_planner_id.empty())
235  {
236  default_pc.group = group_name;
237  default_pc.config = specific_group_params;
238  default_pc.config["type"] = "geometric::RRTConnect";
239  }
240 
241  default_pc.name = group_name; // this is the name of the default config
242  pconfig[default_pc.name] = default_pc;
243 
244  // get parameters specific to each planner type
245  XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue config_names;
246  if (nh_.getParam(group_name + "/planner_configs", config_names))
247  {
248  if (config_names.getType() != XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeArray)
249  {
250  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME,
251  "The planner_configs argument of a group configuration "
252  "should be an array of strings (for group '%s')",
253  group_name.c_str());
254  continue;
255  }
256 
257  for (int j = 0; j < config_names.size(); ++j) // NOLINT(modernize-loop-convert)
258  {
259  if (config_names[j].getType() != XmlRpc::XmlRpcValue::TypeString)
260  {
261  ROS_ERROR_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Planner configuration names must be of type string (for group '%s')",
262  group_name.c_str());
263  continue;
264  }
265 
266  const std::string planner_id = static_cast<std::string>(config_names[j]);
267 
268  planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationSettings pc;
269  if (loadPlannerConfiguration(group_name, planner_id, specific_group_params, pc))
270  pconfig[pc.name] = pc;
271  }
272  }
273  }
274 
275  for (const std::pair<const std::string, planning_interface::PlannerConfigurationSettings>& config : pconfig)
276  {
277  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, "Parameters for configuration '" << config.first << "'");
278 
279  for (const std::pair<const std::string, std::string>& parameters : config.second.config)
280  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_NAMED(LOGNAME, " - " << parameters.first << " = " << parameters.second);
281  }
282 
283  setPlannerConfigurations(pconfig);
284 }
285 
286 void ompl_interface::OMPLInterface::printStatus()
287 {
288  ROS_INFO_NAMED(LOGNAME, "OMPL ROS interface is running.");
289 }
